attributes.action: give his support to the 'Keep Casualty in Bristol' campaign
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please support the 'Keep Casualty in Bristol' campaign and urge the BBC to stop the move of Casualty from Bristol to Cardiff.

Moving a regional production from one nation to a different nation does not mean the BBC are producing more regional programmes.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
